website_summaries.verdict: An affordable package of drain snakes with multiple types.
pros: All seven drain snakes are  23.6 inches long
Includes five plastic drain snakes and two stainless steel snakes with a gripper at the end
Flexes easily to pull out blockages
cons: Steel snakes are a little more difficult to use than the plastic ones

customer_reviews.title: Stuck
customer_reviews.text: The drain snake got stuck in my drain and the snake broke off in the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Handy for those hard to reach small item drops
customer_reviews.text: Handy tools, helped me pull small items from dryer lint trap.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela S Kjensrud

customer_reviews.title: Works great and reusable
customer_reviews.text: Worked well as described . The orange pieces are supposed to be disposable, but you can easily use them several times before throwing away. I opened one and have used it in 3 different drains and still going strong
customer_reviews.author: Bainmeister

customer_reviews.title: no harsh chemicals...
customer_reviews.text: Worked as soon as I used it to unclog a stubborn bathroom sink.
customer_reviews.author: OBXer4LIFE

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work well for constricted drain caps.
customer_reviews.text: If your drain isn’t one big giant open hole, then these will NOT work. Ours has a metal cap that is more or less patterned with a cross or Phillip shape, these plastic things and the metal grabber CANNOT go inside too far. Useless...
customer_reviews.author: BluePetals

customer_reviews.title: The plastic ones are basically disposable. Silver ones too big.
customer_reviews.text: The silver grabbers won’t fit down a standard tub drain. Too big. The plastic orange ones did a great job of pulling a massive amount of hair from the drain, but they are basically disposable. It’s hard to get all the hair off the plastic ones for reuse after you use it, and some of the plastic prongs break off when you are yanking it back out of the drain. I would have preferred a 20 pack of the orange disposable ones and none of the silver ones at all
customer_reviews.author: C Home

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: This product is worth the money. It is easy to use, doesn't take any instructions or particular skill. Worked great at removing hair from bath tub drain.
customer_reviews.author: TexasLady

customer_reviews.title: Easy and effective.
customer_reviews.text: Unclogged 2 wrecked drains with one of the plastic pieces, worked perfectly. Great investment for the money.
customer_reviews.author: G Dubz

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product to remove all the hairs tht ever get stuck in your drainage. I used this to clean my bathroom sink and he worked wonders to clean it completely.
customer_reviews.author: SMW

customer_reviews.title: Effective. Unclogged drain immediately!
customer_reviews.text: I liked this. Easy to use and immediately effective! I have 6 left and won't be using them anytime soon. Be careful not to get impatient. Take it easy pulling this device out of the drain after twisting down the sink or it will don't slimy crud everywhere. This did not happen to me since I was aware it could happen from reading other reviews. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: QueenConch

customer_reviews.title: Drain snake
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t want to keep bothering my land lord so I bought these to drain my pipes. Comes with 5 plastic and 2 metal drain snakes. The tools itself work pretty well though I wish it came with some sort of instructions.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Gets the Job Done!
customer_reviews.text: This product was a life saver for me when the bathtub got clogged. I used the orange tool and the silver metal one and it got everything out of the drain. I would highly recommend getting this for anyone who has a clogged bathtub.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They work great, if you're too lazy to work on the drain
customer_reviews.text: The fact of the matter is that this is a product for lazy people like me. Sure, I can remove the drain stopper, but I hate working under the sink. These snakes worked fine, though it sometimes takes some serious jiggling to get them out of the drain.
customer_reviews.author: David Wolff

customer_reviews.title: Great for getting hair out of drains!
customer_reviews.text: I have two daughters with long hair and this product has been helpful with managing hair in the drain before it becomes a real issue. I would recommend you adding these to your home tool set. It will not work for all drain issues, but for certain clogs this is a must!
customer_reviews.author: Carey Noble Pugh

customer_reviews.title: Zipit tools are wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't get the drain snake to work in my drains (bathtub nor bathroom sink). Probably made for a larger drain. The Zipit tool, however, digs the hair right out of both drains and is a wonderful product for my use!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Crowe

customer_reviews.title: Great tools!
customer_reviews.text: I like this tools very much. Multiple use for the whole house. Easy to use and very effective. Must have for your house. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Meng Yin

customer_reviews.title: Pretty useless
customer_reviews.text: The Drain Zips hardly work at all, and they arrive folded in half, so they are difficult to aim them in the drain. The teeth are not long enough to snag what is necessary, and the tool isn't long enough. Buy yourself a quality drain zip instead of these pieces of garbage. The claw tool works ok. I was able to retrieve an earring from the trap with in.
customer_reviews.author: N. D.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: I can't tell you how great this product works. Its incredible and cleans out a drain in just a couple of minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Toni Romao

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: These are way to cheap. They all lasted maybe 1 use and it was to soft and not strong enough to be able to use again. I won't recommend or buy again.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality - Useless
customer_reviews.text: Inferior quality. Plastic items are so flimsy they buckle at the handle end when trying to push into drain trap, and the metal ones are too stiff to go through the trap.
customer_reviews.author: Zlinski

customer_reviews.title: 10 of 10
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Removed a clog of hair shaped exactly like a hockey puck. Amazing. Cleaning the drain is so satisfying. If you want to feel like the backbone of your household, buy these bad boys.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great way to clear drain!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have a European above counter and stopper that has been a real pain to clear hair from restricted drain flow. These did the trick, GREAT PRODUCT!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have long hair and feel like I’m constantly shedding. So it’s no surprise our tub stopped draining. I stuck the orange drain snake in and it literally pulled most of the hair out the first time. I bought a ton of dran-o because I swore I was going to need it- didn’t need any of it.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Bittinger

customer_reviews.title: Grabs clogs from the drain very well.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well to catch hair clogs. But the sticks work only one time since the edges do break as you pull them out of the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Muffles

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: the plastic is a little flimsy compared to the ones you would purchase from Home Depot so it's a little more difficult to use, but it works.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!!!
customer_reviews.text: Tried numerous bathtub drain cleaning options but THIS WAS THE BEST!!! We have only needed to use twice to clean the hair!!! Actually first time the drain worked properly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not baf
customer_reviews.text: It works but not as easily in some drains. A basic drain it works pretty good
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Davis

customer_reviews.title: They get the job done!
customer_reviews.text: Unclogged my bathroom sink in seconds! So gross, but strangely satisfying! :D
customer_reviews.author: Lil

customer_reviews.title: Easy and quick
customer_reviews.text: Worked like magic in our case. Our clog was not all that bad so I am not sure how this product would work if it was severe. We found it to be quick and easy to use. Great alternative for harsh chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Katerina Vlasova

customer_reviews.title: Grabber's work well but...
customer_reviews.text: The orange strips with the teeth do not do a great job on hair.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: wow, perfectly awesome
customer_reviews.text: so these little plastic zip drain cleaners are the best thing ever invented. I didn't even care about the metal drain snake that comes with it.
customer_reviews.author: Brimarteen

customer_reviews.title: works as it should
customer_reviews.text: i haven't used the metal ones but the plastic ones worked pretty good
customer_reviews.author: Silly

customer_reviews.title: Too flimsy and Barbs broke on one use
customer_reviews.text: Too flimsy and barbs broke with one use. I have purchased similar items of a different brand from Home Depot and they worked well and the barbs did not break off.
customer_reviews.author: charmaine

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Helped out my clogged up drain tremendously! It brought up some,surprising things I didnt even know were down there.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Fairbanks

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality product
customer_reviews.text: 2 stars because the claw grabbing tool seems like it could be useful at some point. The plastic snakes though are complete trash. The quality of the plastic is is like the pull tab string from a milk jug. One use and it's ready to snap and get stuck in the drain. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extra eeew
customer_reviews.text: I got so much gunk out of the tub drain and sink ... it was so foul ... but now it is gone!
customer_reviews.author: Price Family

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: These are not bad, not great....pretty mediocre. I believe you can get better deals at your local hardware store.
customer_reviews.author: RHH_MSEE

customer_reviews.title: Great drain declogger
customer_reviews.text: Works great in pulling clogs of hair out of drain.
customer_reviews.author: kasy

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to unclog any drain and definitely saves you a call to the plumber.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Echols

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Got a good amount of hair out. Cheap and effective.
customer_reviews.author: JayBen

customer_reviews.title: Pointless buy
customer_reviews.text: Ok I used it to unclog my vacuum and it didn’t work so well.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Only good for one use
customer_reviews.text: Only have used the orange portion of the drain snake.
customer_reviews.author: Prima Donna

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Gots the hugest, hair clog from my bathroom sink. Great value, can use again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Diane G

customer_reviews.title: Useless plastic snake
customer_reviews.text: It has several teeth broken when I use it. Besides the metal snake is too thick.
customer_reviews.author: Waxinton

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap plastic doesn’t work. Barbs break off too easy. Bends and won’t push through clog.
customer_reviews.author: Chris B.

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me!!
customer_reviews.text: I used this Drain Snake for my bathroom sink, and I still have the same problem!
customer_reviews.author: Ms Tea

customer_reviews.title: Great tools
customer_reviews.text: Very handy in cleaning out the hair from your drains.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: worthless
customer_reviews.text: wont even go down my drain. it was a lot wider than I thought
customer_reviews.author: ann

customer_reviews.title: They’re awful
customer_reviews.text: I’ll make this easy, hated everything about this product. Flat out didn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Handy!
customer_reviews.text: Always nice to have around with the shedding girl's do !
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This worked great and got so muxh hair out of my tub drain! It was also really easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy to use the bathtub drain, very good
customer_reviews.author: Jonny

customer_reviews.title: Kid toy
customer_reviews.text: Kind of like those play toys you get for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Better than using chemicals
customer_reviews.text: I waz searching all over for something like this and needing it quickly I waz glad to find this and with amazon prime. It has come in handy many times and is more of an environmental way of clearing drains than using chemicals. Easy to use and cleans up easy as well.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Spector

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase; usefully product
customer_reviews.text: Worked like a champ on both of my bathroom tubs.
customer_reviews.author: Von Torres

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Clean tool help us to remove clogs and debris to allow smooth drain pipe flow
customer_reviews.author: Pham B.

product_meta.title: 7 Pack Drain Snake, Kungix Drain Clog Remover Clogged Drain Hair Remover Zipit Drain Cleaning Tool
feature_bullets: Save Money And Times: Easy to operate yourself, You will no longer need expensive plumber services with this affordable drain snake cleaning tool, and it is 100% ecologically safe drain opener for you and environment, less expensive than toxic chemical drain cleaners

Long Reach: Drain snake cleaner is an extra long drain clog remover to get real deep into drains to remove any clogs and debris to allow smooth drain pipe flow, and long enough to keep your hands never reached the drain, keep your hands clean and simply get rid of the tool after cleaning;

Springy Wound-Steel Cable & Gripper Design: The handle on the top of the pick-up tool was constructed with a sturdy grip for an easier control. flexible wand has dozens of burrs and hooks that grab & remove hair, food, garbage, and other obstructions. Flexes in narrow angels and channels.

Durability: Drain snake and drain clog remover is made of a heavy duty eco friendly plastic construction to ensure there is no breakage, and maximum flexibility when being used. Clogged drain hair remover is built to last through everyday use.

Multi-Function: Drain Clog Remover can use to remove hair, food, garbage and other obstacles with a four claw retractable grip or as a grabber for something under the couch or down a vent. Drain snake are ideal for kitchen, wash basin, clogged drains, sewers, bathroom & utility sinks, tubs and showers clog remover.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars140 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
